remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当设置了 控件 属性或 `true`其 属性时，才会发生 事件。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 当你希望根据单元格的值或状态确定其错误时，处理 事件非常有用。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state. 处理 事件并在处理程序中指定错误文本时，将在单元格中显示错误标志符号，除非 属性设置为 `false` 或该单元格处于编辑模式。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode. 当用户将鼠标指针移到错误标志符号上方时，错误文本将显示在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 只要检索 属性的值，就会发生 事件。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 您可以使用 "" 和 "" 属性来确定单元的状态或值，并使用此信息来更改或修改 属性。You can use the and property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性将用单元 属性的值进行初始化，该属性的值将重写。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 处理大量数据时处理 事件，以避免将多个单元格的单元 值设置为性能下降。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中，演示了如何创建单元格的错误消息，而无需取消行的共享，或者在所有共享单元格上复制单元格错误。In the following code example demonstrates how to create error messages for cells without unsharing rows or causing the cell error to be duplicated over all the shared cells.
